item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by R. Tagore
item.description: "Apaga si quieres tu luz, yo descubriré tu oscuridad y la amaré. " -- R. Tagore

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Dante Alighieri
item.description: "No hay mayor dolor en el infortunio que recordar el tiempo feliz." -- Dante Alighieri

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "El amor es sufrido, es benigno; el amor no tiene envidia, el amor no es jactancioso, no se envanece; no hace nada indebido, no busca lo suyo, no se irrita, no guarda rencor; no se goza de la injusticia, más se goza de la verdad. Todo lo sufre, todo lo espera, todo lo soporta. El amor nunca deja de ser..." -- Anonymous

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Quién ama ha vencido el mundo y no teme perder nada, el verdadero amor supone un acto de entrega total. " -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "If there hadn't been a sixth day, man would not exist; copper would always be copper; and lead just lead. It's true that everything has its Personal Legend, but one day that Personal Legend will be realized. So each thing has to transform itself into something better, and to acquire a new Personal Legend, until, someday, the Soul of the World becomes one thing only." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Life is too short, or too long, for me to allow myself the luxury of living it so badly." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description:
"Passion makes a person stop eating, sleeping, working, feeling at peace. A lot of people are frightened because, when it appears, it demolishes all the old things it finds in its path.
No one wants their life thrown into chaos. That is why a lot of people keep that threat under control, and are somehow capable of sustaining a house or a structure that is already rotten. They are the engineers of the superseded.
Other people think exactly the opposite: they surrender themselves without a second thought, hoping to find in passion the solutions to all their problems. They make the other person responsible for their happiness and blame them for their possible unhappiness. They are either euphoric because something marvelous has happened or depressed because something unexpected has just ruined everything.
Keeping passion at bay or surrendering blindly to it - which of these two attitudes is the least destructive?
I don't know." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Dante Alighieri
item.description: "No fuisteis criados para vivir como bestias sino para seguir en pos de la virtud y la sabiduría. " -- Dante Alighieri

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Sun Tzu
item.description: "Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win" -- Sun Tzu

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "If I knew that today would be the last time I’d see you, I would hug you tight and pray the Lord be the keeper of your soul. If I knew that this would be the last time you pass through this door, I’d embrace you, kiss you, and call you back for one more. If I knew that this would be the last time I would hear your voice, I’d take hold of each word to be able to hear it over and over again. If I knew this is the last time I see you, I’d tell you I love you, and would not just assume foolishly you know it already." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Laughter is the language of the soul." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: ツ María ♥ add a quote by Henry van Dyke
item.description: "Time is Too Slow for those who Wait, Too Swift for those who Fear, Too Long for those who Grieve, Too Short for those who Rejoice; But for those who Love, Time is not." -- Henry van Dyke
